Html:
How can i reduce size of Rich Text Editor? It is always shown as fixed size but it is exceeding the size of my page. If I try to set the height and width of this control then it does reduces the size. Rather it starts working in strange way. I am using ASP.NET/C# for coding and IE 7 as default browser.

Thanks in advance.

Got the solution by myself. Help not required...

Just made some changes in the code and recompiled and used newly build DLL. It worked.
